website_summaries.verdict: The airtight seal on these containers works well and can keep your cereal very fresh.
pros: Can handle a regular sized box of cereal
Chalkboard labels and pen help label cereal
cons: These containers could be a little bigger
They do not hold larger amounts of cereal

customer_reviews.title: Pantry Must Have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must. I love that you can see what type of cereal and most importantly, how much is left. Love the labels and the marker is actually a great marker.. It writes very bright and dries fast. Every Pantry needs this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product & Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for, mostly to keep bugs away. They have hermetic seals that’ll do the trick. They’re not made out of flimsy plastic, but rather a sturdy one. They fit perfectly in my shelves. For the price, this product is a steal. More importantly to me, though, is the company’s excellent customer support. One of the lids wasn’t closing properly (too small, not defective). I wrote the company directly to request a new lid only. By the next day, they wrote back saying they’d actually shipped a 2 piece container set! They exceeded my expectations in an extremely timely manner. I’ll definitely continue to buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cereal Collection Contained!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help organize my grandkids cereal collection while visiting in Brooklyn. Apts there need all the help they can get and these were perfect to set on counter. They are larger than I expected and the big box of cheerios fit in one. Easy to open for them to be self efficient. Easy lock system.
customer_reviews.author: The Traveling Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Takes up way to much shelf space.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Hard to tell from the Manufacturer’s pictures, but these are much wider at the top than the bottom, so when lined up next to each other, they waste a considerable amount of shelf space. I can fit two of these containers in the same space I used to fit three cereal boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Magnani

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to help organize my pantry. They are thin and nicely shaped in order to fit several on a shelf. The ability to change the names written on the containers is a nice way to keep using them over and over. I like these so much I have ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cereal containers
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, does exactly what I wanted, keeps my cereal fresh!! I purchased them after having my 4th box of cereal go stale in the boxes because I could not eat them fast enough. I just purchased my 2nd set to give as a Christmas gift after using for a few months and seeing how well they work. They are sturdy, love that the lid fits into the containers and then snaps also to keep it sealed perfect! I have had the same cereal in for at least 2 months now and still fresh as ever. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for cereal containers.
customer_reviews.author: Eaglesfan

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to open
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for more than a month to like it. I even generated the return label, but I didn't return it because I decided to put more use before saying that I don't like it. Pros: It's airtight. I feel the cereal remains as fresh as just opened. Cons: Super tight to open to pour some cereal. It's so tight sometime we help each other to open it. Really this problem makes the container unusable. Also while opening the top, the snap from the narrow side pops open. If this is a defective item, send me a new one. Otherwise I assume this is how the product is and I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Farhana S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality containers for the price, and the labels and chalk marker are a great bonus!
customer_reviews.text: The containers are a nice quality and the lids have nice latches that seem sturdier than similar type containers. I thought they would be a little bigger than they actually are though, the Costco sized bags of cereal just barely fit. Overall I’m really happy with them and glad they came on a three pack.
customer_reviews.author: maggiesmama

customer_reviews.title: Holds a Lot of Cereal
customer_reviews.text: These are great containers... they hold a lot more cereal than other ones I've had before. (It used to be that you could put most of the cereal into the container, but still had to keep the box until you'd eaten a few bowls.) This easily fits the full box. They're sturdy and look nice in the pantry, too.
customer_reviews.author: L. Verni

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality cereal containers answer our issues!
customer_reviews.text: Tired of looking at messy cereal boxes in your cabinets? Cereal getting stale before finishing the box? Chef's Path has the answer for you! These amazing storage boxes are not only cost effective but are the answer to all of our issues! We are a small start up in the Silicon Valley and our employees love cereal but we were plagued by messy cabinets and not knowing that the cereal was running out until it did. Now we have our cereal in these beautiful containers that solve all our problems. We also use them for chips and crackers!
customer_reviews.author: Rain Therapeutics

customer_reviews.title: Just got it few days back and broken already
customer_reviews.text: The packing was not very user friendly. It was so tough to separate those boxes from each other. Also, the description of the product clearly said that they were dishwasher safe. I placed the in the dishwasher before I filled them up with the stuff and one of the containers is broken already.
customer_reviews.author: Kavya

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Organizer
customer_reviews.text: They work well - almost too well. Sometimes it’s hard to pop open the pour tab. And I had to ask my boyfriend to separate them from each other because they were stacked in the box and I couldn’t pull them apart. Very durable. The chalk marker didn’t work, but I ordered two products and the other one worked so no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: L. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: This product is not airtight! The first night I received the containers I filled them up with my favorite cereal, CINNAMON TOAST CRUNCH!! The next morning there were ants all up in there not giving a flying feather of a duck about no 100% airtight seal. If you were trying to ruin breakfast for people everywhere then you've succeeded. I will gladly take my money back thank you!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! And just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and just what I was looking for. I'm a huge fan of bagged cereal, but I hate that my kids can't quite grasp how to close them, which causes a full bag to go to waste. Ugh... The seal on the lids are great, and don't open when my kids are getting their breakfast in the morning. Which was a concern of mine when looking for cereal containers. I didn't want the lid to come off while they were pouring their breakfast (I remember this happening to me when I was you with much older plastic containers, and the horror that rushes through you when there's a pile of cereal on the table. Lol)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome seal! The price is amazing for 3 of them! Labels are super cute
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Classy
customer_reviews.text: We love these containers in our home. They are very well-made and sturdy, and the labels, chalk marker, and spoons they come with were a great bonus. I never really thought about what I wanted in a cereal container until I tried these. This company has really thought of everything. The lids snap on and off easily, but they are tight so you know your cereal will stay fresh. I was able to fit a family-size box of cereal into one of these containers, but they don't take up much room and look really nice side-by-side. I highly-recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ceeley

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and costs less than other options.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box the containers were smaller than I had expected but I grab one of our boxes of cereal and quickly realized that it would all fit in there just fine. And at first that chalkboard markers didn’t work but I tried again the next day and then it worked so I guess I just needed a little bit of time to warm up or something!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although it’s airtight and keeps the cereal from being stale, I had to give it 1 star. Two of the containers broke from being dropped. I’m surprised how fragile they are since they’re plastic. Usually plastics become brittle with age due to expose to heat, UV, or chemicals. Both I only had them a few weeks. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: NEWBY

customer_reviews.title: What a mess..
customer_reviews.text: I got two different sizes.. should of been 4 all the same size. The locking tabs were snapped off & broke on some of the lids and the ones that weren't broken, just didn't even attempt to stay latched. Waste. Sending back as defective as well as broken. Did't come with measuring spoons or chalk pen for the labels either.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these storage containers. I originally bought one of the higher priced airtight cereal containers from Target (just one of them was over twenty dollars). It was nice and worked great but entirely too pricey. I needed more of the containers since my kids have recently gotten more into cereal so we’re buying more of it. These are a great price for three and they work just the same as the higher priced ones. I actually like these better because they seem more durable. The plastic is thicker and doesn’t seem like it’s going to break when dropped, unlike the other higher end one.
customer_reviews.author: Alexus Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Greatest containers I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my chefs path cereal containers. Not only are they extremely durable, they're designed with an easy grip to pour and a hole big enough to pour appropriate amounts. The chalkboard stickers and pen were a nice touch and I got a huge surprise when there was a set of measuring cups included! Will definitely be ordering more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Novaes

customer_reviews.title: Impossible for kids to open...
customer_reviews.text: Came on time They seem to store food well. The labels, pen n measuring cups was perfect. Our issue is they are a pain in the Butte to open. I purchased these specifically so my kids could make their own cereal in the morning. (More independent, basically ages 6-10) My children can not open them. I even have a hard time opening them. Also we have to use our fingers to help get the cereal out of these. I will not recommend to anyone I know. The labels n measuring cups was the only thing I actually liked about this product but not worth what I paid. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Twisted*Hippie*Mom

customer_reviews.title: Durability!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable! The best thing is that the there is measurements on the side of the container. It is kind of faint but I like that because it is uniformed for transparency. Also to activate the chalk marker you must flip the tip so you can write on the tabs that they provide for you. If you’re big into storage systems and like to have things last for a long time, than you found your product. I’ve had other container made of a clear hard plastic, that when dropped it cracked. This didn’t have that problem (sadly we are very clumsy.) HOWEVER, No cracks.
customer_reviews.author: J.B

customer_reviews.title: Would actually be better without the lid to pour from
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and make a good seal. However, I'm not able to successfully pour any of the cereals I eat from them. Crispix just simply bunches up and clogs the hole, nothing comes out. Basic 4 and other similar cereals clog up then suddenly let go and go over the bowl onto the counter. Additionally dust from the cereal gets all over the lid and sticks to the seal. So then you have to clean the top. I've started just keeping the cereal in the original bag and putting the bag in the container. Then just open the container and pour from the bag. This keeps them cleaner as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cuozzo

customer_reviews.title: Good for smaller sized cereal.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because if you put larger sized cereal in them, you have to work to get them out. Specifically mini wheats. They tend to jamb in the opening instead of pouring out nice and easily. Yes, it's a minor inconvenience, it's just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Top pops
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. however when your closing the pour spout the sides pop open & the pour spout opening isn’t very good or big enough for cereal like life or mini wheats. I wouldn’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not clear like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I thought they'd look nice on our kitchen table. They do not look like the pictures. They are whitish plastic, not clear. They look very tacky and I'd never use them for display. I'm very disappointed. They also arrive stacked inside eachother and I haven't been able to separate the bottom two. I'd send them back if it wasn't an additional pain to box them up again. Also, the company has emailed me a ton looking for reviews. So, here is my review.
customer_reviews.author: catpause

customer_reviews.title: Okay for dry goods
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I'd use these on cereal that powders or usually has that layer of crushed bits at the bottom, as those will undoubtedly get caught on the lip inside. Once poured, some cereals also like to cling around the lid which I'm sure doesn't make for an air tight seal unless you brush it off before closing. These of course are all just minor issues, so far they seem to be holding up well enough - although the top of the container wont latch if you're holding it too tight I've found. We'll see what happens after a couple months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Professional marketing
customer_reviews.text: I received these today and quality is excellent! The plastic container is sturdy and not flimsy. The tops click on perfectly and seal tightly. The construction is smooth and uniform. It's a William Sonoma nice. And they also.came with a very pretty set of colorful and equally well made set of measuring cups. The cups have the sizes imprinted, instead of the type that rub off after use. They also come.with 10 percent off coupons for your next purchase. I just purchased another set. You dont see quality at this price often so I am sold.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful containers and are perfect to store cereal in our small cabinets in our travel trailer. I love that they come with labels and even measuring cups. This is the best value you'll get for a great price. I am very impressed that I also received an email from the company owner ensuring that I received their product in a timely manner and thanking me for my business. In a world full of large corporatations and unpersonalized customer service, it's nice to feel like a valued customer by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging, delivery, customer service, durability, looks, it's got it all so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am in love with this company. The packaging and delivery, flawless. The design of the product, excellent!. Tye only reason I haven't given it a 5 is because I haven't had them long enough to judge freshness, but so far they seem 'tight' meaning in both the seal and awesome! So happy to get rid of multiple cereals falling out of the cabinet!! Kudos to the customer service note as well. Most excellent touch. I will be back to your website!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Find another brand and when you do let me know!
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were going to be great I got 2 sets and more than half the lids were not sealed tight at all!! Like I could just tip the container over and the lid would open how is this "water tight"? I would not reccomend find another brand sorry 😭
customer_reviews.author: hippiechickie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that does what it should
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, very durable, lids work well, keeps cereal fresh, easy to see into, love the bonus stickers, measuring cups and chalk board marker. I needed these for my husband's different cereals and before now had just bags tied shut on top of fridge which looked terrible. Now I have nice containers that are easy to fill and use and to see which cereal is which without fear of bugs, and stale cereal. Easy to clean. I am glad I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny1

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: The cereal containers arrived on time. The packaging was exceptional. I am very pleased with the size of the containers and the molded contour for easy grasping. The seals on the top look quite substantional and latching on all 4 sides of the containers should seal exceptionally well. Only time will tell if the seals compress or the hinges on the latches will wear out. At this point I am very satisfied and will most certainly purchase other containers this seller.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaRanger

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design poor functionality as cereal container
customer_reviews.text: Pictures speak louder than words but let me give you context... This is my first use after purchasing but the cereal keeps getting clogged because the hole is too small! Literally have to shake and poke to fill the bowl lol. Maybe it's different for a round cereal vs Cinnamon Toast Crunch little square pieces... Maybe I'll upgrade my review over long term use but right now first impressions are terrible for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: After pooring food into container we realized it was already cracked. After that we realized the lid was warped and didn’t fit on the container.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Brady

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: This product has false advertising . Online and on the box it clearly states that you will receive 3 piece cereal containers , 8 chalkboard labels, 1 liquid marker , 4 piece spoon set , and card with bonus surprises and the only thing I received was the containers and tops NOTHING ELSE! This is the only time I have ever had an issue with an amazon order and I’m highly upset .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and love the extra gifts
customer_reviews.text: I’m very satisfied with these containers. They’re the perfect height and are wide so they can hold a lot of things. The seal tight and the lid can be opened by my older child, but not my toddler, which is a plus. The toddler kept on raiding the cereal boxes and leaving the cereal exposed to air. I like that it comes with the cute labels PLUS chalkboard marker. Another added bonus are the measuring cups which is plastic, but good quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cereal Containers we love!
customer_reviews.text: For the price these seem really great. Very sturdy, easy to use, clamp tightly down when closed. My boys (6 and 4) can open them to serve themselves cereal each morning. I love that they came with measuring cups and labels too! I am hoping they hold up well, as they've already gotten a LOT of use this past week and a half. Each container holds one large box of cereal with some room to spare. If you buy the big bags of cereal it won't hold the whole bag, but almost!
customer_reviews.author: FormerlyAGaulzetti

customer_reviews.title: Better than the bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these containers, they fit the cereal perfectly, and are so much easier than dealing with the bags. Seal very tightly, and keep it fresh. They also look much nicer on the shelf, love the pretty labels!
customer_reviews.author: Jmin22

customer_reviews.title: 4 star review
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to review until i had ample time to see how the product works. I originally bought them because cereal doesnt stay fresh in the box. I buy cereal once a month as We dont go through it that quickly. After the 1st round and noticed that the end of the container (enough) for a bowl maybe was stale. Overall its an easy to use easy to clean product but it didnt make my food last longer which is why its not 5 stars for me
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Solid, practical and airtight!
customer_reviews.text: I love this storage set! It is simple, easy to use and practical for storing food. Listen if you just want to class up your pantry or keep ants and rodents out of your food, this is the brand. I made mistakes buying other hard, thin plastic containers but this is strong, durable and versatile. I really like the pour spouts and pour options on some of them. I originally ordered one set of different sizes and just had to order more! Thanks for your ingenuity!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really worked washed and placed my cereal in it and kept ti fresh. Not the right size for a family bag of cereal. But since I'm a single family it works for a box of cereal. The containers are heavy plastic, lids are fit properly and snap pour lid is tight also. Well made highly recommend them price was reasonable. Buying more in near future. Didn't use the erasable labels but nice that they included them. Second review on these because hadn't put cereal in them till this week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for and more!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and than some. I needed good cereal containers that would store my cereal and not let it get stale. This cane with 3 which was perfect for the shelf I keep it on and a bonus was the cute chalkboard labels and chalk marker it came with! So they work great, they are practical, and they are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: jaimie

customer_reviews.title: The best food storage containers to be found
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three cereal storage containers and am 100% satisfied. They are sturdy, easy to grip, even in my old hands, keep the cereal fresh, and the chalkboard labels are ideal for identifying contents. I plan on future purchases from you since I am completely sold on your product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Containers, highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these cereal containers, actually so much that I ended up buying another pack. They are simple and clean in their looks, and their size fits really well. I have currently had them in two different kitchens, and they have fit in both places, where as some other containers I had were just a tiny to bit and bulky. It is a great product, and it is sturdy, and easy to clean and use. I would highly recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia

customer_reviews.title: The plastic breaks
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I got my order. The lid was hard to get on at first and I would assume it was air tight. However, my husband didn't have the lid completely straight and when he snap the sides, one side broke. I was dissatisfied because I was hoping that they would last long than a month. My kids also find it difficult to align the lid with the container for that perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Made my cereal go bad .
customer_reviews.text: Got these for cereal . Cereal went bad in a couple weeks in it. Would’ve been better in their original box with a chip clip for the bag. These suck.
customer_reviews.author: ray bockaj

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Good size, all clear, and I really like that they come with the labels and chalk marker so I didn’t have to purchase anything separately! They seem to be a good quality👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Napierski

customer_reviews.title: Overall, nice containers!
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed okay priced. Just recieved the product and appears very durable. Containers were a little difficult to separate but doesn't take away the 100% happiness of this product itself. Lids are nice and tight to the container. The pop-open lid part seems tight also; flipped it upside down (filled with cereal) and shook to make sure nothing came out and all was well! Containers arent super clear but can still visually see what is what with no issues. I like that it came with a marker and labels too; that was a bonus along with the spoons. I would recommend this product to anyone and more than likely gonna purchase more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Airtight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! I needed something to hold cereal and other things like that in my cupboard and they do the job. The mouth is slightly awkward for pouring, but I have no complaints. This is a package of 3 and came with some really nice scoops. I agree with others who said that the fact that the canisters flare out makes them a little bit less perfect for lining up on a shelf, but if you alternate tops up and down, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pleased with these.
customer_reviews.text: These were small. Took 2 to empty a cereal box. I didn’t like the hole at the top... (1) I noticed ithe top hole wasn’t closed all the way and (2) It spilled outside the bowl when pouring from the top. I wasn’t as pleased with these compared to other ones that I have. If I wasn’t in a wheelchair right now I probably would have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: SassyLang

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to put our cereal in since the kids kept leaving it open and the cereal would go stale. It is just as good as some of those expensive brands but a lot easier to clean and I love the labels. It is sturdy and works really well. I am very pleased with this that I bought some for rice, sugar, protein powders, and even for pasta
customer_reviews.author: shiela

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and should give long life.
customer_reviews.text: Product is well manufactured. Realizing this explains how stiff they are to assemble. I am certain after some use product will be more cooperative when reassembling. A sign of a good product.
customer_reviews.author: RCarroll

customer_reviews.title: Airtight, Sturdy, Mess-free, Cereal Storage
customer_reviews.text: These containers are sturdy and strong. They keep cereal fresh and contained with a strong, airtight seal. There is no leaking or mess when pouring the cereal. They are a great size and allow better use of space in cabinets. They arrived packaged nicely. You could easily throw some gift wrap on and give them to friends and family. The bonus labels, marker and scoops were an awesome, thoughtful touch. I hope to try more of the containers from this brand soon.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for cereal
customer_reviews.text: Good for cereal....the small boxes. Love these only complaint the plastic tops are not very durable I dropped one storage container from the refrigerator to the floor and got plastic top is broken in places. Need sturdier plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing half the items
customer_reviews.text: Received my package on time but not at all as described. I got 2 large and 2 small containers, and only 4 labels and no marker and no measuring cups..... 🤨 description says 3 large containers, 8 labels, 1 marker, and 4 measuring cups. The whole reason I chose this particular one rather than the several other options out there. Really annoyed but don’t feel like returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage containers
customer_reviews.text: These containers are perfect. I’m using them to store sugar and flour. They fit perfectly in a small area on top of a small cupboard in our kitchen. Got them to replace large oversized canisters that just didn’t work. These are so easy to get from the top of the cupboard when needed. Definitely going to buy more from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: History38

customer_reviews.title: Not as large as it looks but works great for flour and grains
customer_reviews.text: These storage containers are nice enough, but in the pictures it looks like they hold a lot more than they actually do. I can see the benefit of using them to store something like flour or rice, but cereal needs to be refilled pretty quickly. Plus larger cereal (like corn flakes, frosted flakes, smores, etc.) needs a shake or two to get it to come out. Still, pretty convenient for storage for dry goods.
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Kleen

customer_reviews.title: Great Cereal Containers
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some containers to keep cereal fresh and bugs out and these work great. The tops are much more secure than ones we have used previously, so no danger of cereal spilling if you accidentally knock it over. At the same time, it is easy enough for my kids to use. I wish they had a slightly larger size to accommodate the largest bags of cereal we buy, but I knew that when I made the purchase. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Colm Callan

customer_reviews.title: Love these, they are so much better than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are so much better than I expected. They size is great (can fit a large bag of cereal), they fit nicely together inside a cabinet, the plastic seems durable and they latch easily - which will eliminate any accidental spills. Also, the pour spout is large - which has been a problem for us in the past (the cereal won't fit through). The stickers and marker are a nice touch and good quality. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great containers! I was looking got storage/cereal containers but didn't want to spend a fortune. These are right up my alley! They have a great deal and are easy to use. It's great for my 5 year old who gets up early in the morning. He now can reach these and open them himself to have breakfast. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Leto

customer_reviews.title: Keep it crunchy!
customer_reviews.text: These cereal containers are everything I’d hoped for. The indented side is perfect for little hands to grip. (I’m sure they are great for little kid’s hands but I was talking about my own. Ha!). The labels and the chalk pen that are included are a nice touch for the organized pantry. The best part is that my breakfast cereal will now be shelved in an clear container that is both practical and stylish. I will no longer have to guess how much cereal is left or have to toss it because it has lost its crunch.
customer_reviews.author: Gregsgurl

customer_reviews.title: Best Cereal Container!
customer_reviews.text: These cereal containers are perfect. They are easy to fill, easy to clean and most importantly, easy to pour even for my 4 year old grandson. A tab on one of the containers would not stay locked, so I contacted their customer service department. Waleed promptly sent another set. I highly recommend this product and I will be purchasing more for other pantry staples like rice, pasta and oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K.

customer_reviews.title: Cereal container review.
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from Chef’s Path. Only wish the top was same width as bottom. It’s a little wider, so the containers don’t stand flush against each other and waste space. Also, it seems like there is a tiny air hole or two where the pour hole cap attaches to the rest of the lid. When ordering more containers from Chef’s Path (and I will), I will order the stackable square and rectangle sets-those are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Library Girl

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to open
customer_reviews.text: We purchased three of these, the lid is so tight, it is impossible to open not only for a child, but for an adult as well. So I had to buy a different brand as this was useless.
customer_reviews.author: evgenia

customer_reviews.title: SUPER DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have a toddler who gets into everything and our walk in pantry is one if his favorite hide-and-seek spots. In addition to that he pulls everything off the shelves! These kept my pantry organized and super durable so when my son plays with them I don't have a mess of dry food everywhere! The labels are also a beautiful touch.
customer_reviews.author: Porsha Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Hard to close
customer_reviews.text: I have several other containers from this same brand, but these are difficult to close and aren't airtight. The plastic is not a rigid plastic, so when you go to put the lid on and push in on the tabs on the side, the plastic gives way, and it's difficult to get the tabs to lock in place. It would probably be fine if the container weren't so large, but as it is, it's a pain to get the lid on. I do like the write-on labels and markers that come with it. Like I said, I have several others from the same manufacturer, but there's just a design flaw with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Slehde

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but has design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Works okay. There is a major design flaw. When you press the cover down to close the opening where you pour the contents from, the tab that holds the container cover on pops open. You have to keep a palm on that tab while closing the “spout.” Also, plastic is soft so when the container is not full, the container squishes when you try to close the tabs that hold the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: JFC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty annoying. Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: The aesthetics of the product is nice. What I saw online was ideal for what I need. I wanted to store my cereal my sugar and my flower in these containers. But each time I try to close the top besides pop up. And my cereal go stale because the sides will not stay latched. Pretty annoying. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: K.ROB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, a little hard to open.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty much perfect for a standard cereal box, look nice, and are high quality plastic. They are, however, quite difficult to open - at least for now since we've had them less than a month. That's the reason for the 4 instead of 5 stars. That said, it'll probably keep the cereal or whatever you use them for fresher for a longer period of time, so I wouldn't let that dissuade buying them. One note is that, if you're dealing with Costco or big box store cereal boxes (normally about 1.5-2x the size of a standard box), they won't fit into one of these (at least not the ones I purchased).
customer_reviews.author: JMatt

customer_reviews.title: High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: We've had a terribly humid summer and all of our pantry dry goods like cereal and crackers have gotten stale and soggy. These containers have been a lifesaver in keeping our items fresh! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather DiGiacomo

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Update: Since doing the review. The company reached out to me and sent me replacement labels. Great customer service and I will order again!!! OLD REVIEW: I do like the quality of the product. The do appear smaller in person but seem to be good quality. Loved how they included the scoops,marker and labels. It was strange that it says the product comes with 8 labels but two were missing as if someone used a couple before the boxed my product. Still happy just disappointed my OCD wont have matching labels.
customer_reviews.author: Shannel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!!! Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these cereal containers!! The lid is nice and snug and the opening is so easy for my kids to open. They also found the bright colored measuring cups to be helpful and fun for them. I no longer walk into the kitchen with cereal all over the place and ripped open boxes. Having these containers takes the stress out of the mess. I highly recommend these, especially to mamas with messy kiddos. Oh and it comes with pretty stickers and a pen to identify what's in the containers. You get a lot for your money and I will be buying more. They just look so pretty on your counter or in the cupboard. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Cereal containers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cereal containers last week and I liked them, so I ordered three more. The plastic is clear and the lids have a nice snug fit which you would expect for airtight containers, but don't always get. I used the first three to store pasta and clear out some space in the pantry. The lids are interchangable and easy to snap on and off which is nice for my daughter to be able to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy it .
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product . I will not stress how important it is to have these on hand once you open up cereal or any box with food in it . ( you don’t want the problem of having pantry bugs) get these and save yourself the hassle . The containers are a great price and you get labels, scoopers and a marker . You can’t beat that guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, but do not hold entire cereal box
customer_reviews.text: For small or specialty cereal, this is great, but not for large or family size cereal. Does NOT hold standard size Cheerios, but does hold Raisin Bran, regular size. They fit perfectly in my hand and in cabinet with shorter shelf clearance, and easy to pour from. Might be good for other contents too, like oatmeal or snack crackers (Goldfish, Cheez-Its, etc)
customer_reviews.author: D.Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase- no plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. I washed with warm water and dawn dish soap prior to use and have not noticed any plastic smell (I had that problem with different brand). We are using these to store our cereal and chips. I am happy that I bought from this company because they are family owned and value your business. They send you a sweet thank you note with the purchase. I will order more containers from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Came scratched and was hard to pull apart
customer_reviews.text: One of my three containers came early scratched. It is so frustrating because I am trying to organize everything during the weekend when I have time and now I am one container down.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: There are design flaws
customer_reviews.text: The side flaps never went down far enough to hook into place. Fortunately the contents are not in the container long enough to get damp from air exposure. I don't know how airtight the containers are without the side flap sealing. The opening should have a pour spout so the cereal or whatever contents don't splatter all over the horizontal surface. Otherwise, I am enjoying using the containers.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great container for adults, smaller kids...hmm
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the containers were sturdy and the lids snapped easily to close. If I had a complaint is that they were not that easy to use for smaller children. The snap lid once closed is hard for my younger child to open. But I decided to keep them anyway, as she will grow quickly and will learn to get to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Nice containers
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on time, were packaged nicely and were of top quality. The plastic is thick and my husband thought it was glass from afar. The tops fit snugly which should keep my contents fresh for a while. One container held a family size box of cereal (minus two bowls that we poured out prior to using the product). The seller is a small family business and they do an amazing job in reaching out to make sure you are happy with your purchase. I am very pleased with this seller and will look to them first for future kitchen storage.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy, Clean design
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and color of these containers. Plain transparent color and the plastic does not feel like a cheap plastic. The lids secure tightly and the spout is super helpful for the cereal. I also found the stickers and white chalkboard pen super helpful as well. Overall a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sturge

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Tall for  Cupboards
customer_reviews.text: Each container holds 4 quarts or a gallon. That is up to the brim. They are perfect for cereal, flour, rice, beans, or any other dry food. I really like that they fit under my cupboard shelves and that they come with measured scoops that fit into the container. These cups eliminate spilled cereal on the counter. I may buy more after I inventory my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company not only responded but sent an entire replacement set to correct the missing lid issue!!!! EXCELLENT customer service! LOVE these containers. Only issue is one of the lids was missing the cover for the pour hole thingy. Waiting for a response from the seller regarding that. Otherwise these containers are PERFECT for kiddies and HUSBANDS that never close the cereal boxes!!! Will definitely order more are our move!
customer_reviews.author: Lakisha Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Securely Storing Grains
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to try to keep the grain moths from taking over my home. They were easy to clean and fill and close. They are attractive and fit well in the cupboard. I like the feature with the labels and they are sized well for all kinds of baking supplies. So far no moths have made their way in which makes me very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Schuchman

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, good size for large cereal boxes
customer_reviews.text: We bought this storage set because our children kept making messes with cereal boxes. This solved our problem. We're a big family, so we buy large boxes of cereal. These containers have been able to accommodate so far. We're very happy with the product and customer service. Update: my kids have to eat a few bowls of cereal before the contents of the "giant" cereal boxes will fit in one container. This is fine for us because if the containers were bigger, they would also be harder for the kids to pour from.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to Buy
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I feel in love with them. We have already put them to use and love that everything we need to label them came with our order. We would definitely recommend this product to our family and friends. Actually, we are getting ready to order the snack sized containers. VERY EASY to clean, love the fact that the seal is air tight so nothing can get in.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cereal containers
customer_reviews.text: I have an ant problem, so my cereal would be raided every once in a while. These solved the issue perfectly. And they look nice in the pantry as well. One feature I love is that they are secure and airtight, but the lid is a simple lift to open, so you don't have to pop it open each time.
customer_reviews.author: Icewinder

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good product
customer_reviews.text: I just received these containers and filled them today. They are too small for a large family size box of cereal but hold more than a regular box. The chalk pen is better than the ones I already had and the stickers were on par, although one was torn already. Overall, they seem to have a tight fit and make my pantry seem more organized. I would consider buying other products from this seller int he future.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as Lock and Lock brand.
customer_reviews.text: Like the idea; however, too small if you wish to hold 1 box of cereal and the material is not sturdy like the Lock and Lock brand. Plastic feels like it will not hold over time. I’ll keep and use for something but won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: YMill

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger than I thought they would be! That's a huge plus side! They fit perfectly in my shelves in my pantry and look nice. I'm looking for that ultimate "Pinterest board" picture LOL. They are easy to use and my kiddos can open them. I have found out that a lot of the time the lids are too tight for them to get off. That is not the issue with these. My 4 and 6 year old can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Need More
customer_reviews.text: I got these for cereal and quickly realized that I needed more. I often bake and with a house full of men, I try to buy in bulk. Definitely great for cereal and dry food. I'm looking to try the larger containers for flour and sugar.
customer_reviews.author: MissV

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage
customer_reviews.text: Initially when I got this order, it came with 3 containers and only 1 lid. The company quickly resolved the issue and was very kind. The containers are nice and seem very durable. Good for storing cereal, goldfish crackers, etc. I like the labels that comes with them. The only thing I have noticed is that the lids don’t always stay snapped shut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Airtight and very well made! Love them! And the labels and measuring cups are a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace another brand that said airtight....and they weren't! So glad I got these. My grands marshmallows in her cereal are still fresh and crunchy using these! Other brand they sogged up on her. She's very happy so that makes this gramma happy!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Cannot open
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the manufacturer because the lids were really hard to open. They said the batch that I got was defective and that many people have had also the same complaint. They gave me a full refund but honestly, they should take the product down if its defective.
customer_reviews.author: J-rod

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried putting water bit ive seen others day its leak proof. I added a family size box of cereal that fit good but it was not new. They don't save space if your looking for that but they keep cereal fresh and alot easier and mess free for mh kids to use. No more left open cereal bags for me! Small family owned company also so buy if you like these!
customer_reviews.author: Teresita

customer_reviews.title: Thick hard plastic really nice
customer_reviews.text: First the package is very nice and sleek but that's not what really matters I guess I was just shocked by it for some reason. The container's are pretty big more then enough space. The lock seems to be pretty good and tight fit. I really like them. I do think they are a little pricey but it's a small business so they gotta make money to be able to afford a nicer product.
customer_reviews.author: David & Teonia

customer_reviews.title: Buy these now! AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: These are badass! You know you are an adult when you get excited about cereal containers! Legit air tight, sturdy, easy to clean. The chalkboard labels were just icing of the cake, nailed it! Will definitely be looking into more types.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and Inexpensive containers
customer_reviews.text: When packaging arrived it was secure and the box is attractive and well made. I was surprised that they thought to include measuring cups, labels and a marker which means that they were thinking about the customers and their needs. They are definitely quality items and looks good in my pantry. I was disorganized before but those containers sitting side by side on the shelf makes it look like I have my life together.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

product_meta.title: Cereal Container Storage Set - Airtight Food Storage Containers, 8 Labels, Spoon Set & Pen, Great for Flour - BPA-Free Dispenser Keepers (135.2oz) - Chef’s Path (3)
product_meta.description:
YOUR SEARCH FOR THE PERFECT CEREAL CONTAINER SET IS FINALLY OVER

When your Premium Cereal Container Set arrives at your door, rip the cute Amazon brown box open the first chance you get. Take out the Cereal Containers and admire at their elegant design. You have in your hands the most complete Cereal Container Set on Amazon

What separates the Premium Cereal Container Set from the competition. Its simple really. 
It starts with 
• It Comes with 3 Premium Cereal Storage Containers and
• 8 Reusable Chalkboard Labels
• Chalkboard Maker
• The 4 Sided-Locking Lids with Silicone Seal ensure that no air or water enters in
• Made of high-quality BPA-free plastic
• Flip top lid for easy pouring
• Space Saving Design 
• They are also PERFECT for storing flour, sugar, rice, grain, nuts, beans, snacks, past. coffee, tea and even pet food! 
• Microwave and Freezer Safe
feature_bullets: ✮ SUPERIOR BUNDLE - Your complete cereal container bundle comes with 3 premium bpa-free food-storage canisters (9.6 x 9.3 x 3.9 inches), 4pc measuring spoon set, a chalkboard marker & 8 bonus reusable chalkboard Labels allowing you to organize your pantry like never before

✮ KEEP THE CRUNCHINESS ALIVE - Imagine waking up every morning and having your favourite cereal with the same original taste each day, the 4 sided-locking lids with silicone seal ensure that no air or water enters in, keeping your cereal super fresh and dry

✮ VERSATILE CONTAINERS - MANY GREAT USES: These air-tight food-safe plastic containers are not only ideal for storing cereals but they are also perfect for storing flour, brown sugar, rice, grains, pasta, coffee and even pet food

✮ SPACE SAVING DESIGN - These durable cereal holders have been especially designed to minimize space and will easily fit into your refrigerator, freezer or cupboards which enables you to get the kitchen organized and frees up space in the pantry

✮ OUR PROMISE: We are completely confident that you will Love our cereal containers, if you don't love it or don't feel it was worth every penny of your investment today, we'll give your full payment back no questions asked and you can keep the cereal containers as well.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,406 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
